participant_1.background:
My favorite possession is the watch my grandfather gave me.
i think i have talent for it.
my glasses are always dirty and i can t seem to get them clean.
I enjoy taking care of animals and using my nice office supplies.
i just graduated college with my bachelors degree in education.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy eating at the local pub on sunny days after a round of golf with my friends.
My favorite thing to do is read, but I would be unable to do it if I were blind.
i manage all the paperwork and incoming calls.
I love to travel and capture moments with my camera.
i m not much of a fan of hot weather.

content.text: Hello! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, especially outside in the summertime, but I can't if I were blind.
I love reading too! I just graduated college with my degree in education. I'm going to teach kindergarten.
That's awesome! I'm a manager at a local pub. I manage all the paperwork and incoming calls.
What do you like most about your job?
I love the atmosphere and the people I work with. It's like family.
That's great to hear! I'm sure you're a great manager.
Thank you! What do you like to do in your free time?
I love to take care of animals and use my nice office supplies. I have a dog named Max and two cats named Mittens and Snowball.
Aww, that's so cute! I love animals too. I have a dog named Charlie.
What's your favorite thing to do with Charlie?
I love to take him for walks and play fetch in the park.
That sounds like so much fun! I love spending time with my animals too.
It's the best! What's your favorite office supply?
I love my nice pens and pencils. They make writing so much more enjoyable.
I love using my fancy markers to color in my coloring books.
That's such a fun hobby! I love coloring too.
It's so relaxing.
I agree. It's a great way to de-stress.
I'm glad we found something in common!
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who shares your interests.
I agree
